wikipedia_page.main: James Stephenson (10 February 1895 – 1 February 1958) was an English professional footballer who made over 190 appearances in the Football League for Watford as an outside right. He also played league football for Aston Villa, Sunderland and Queens Park Rangers.

response: Wallington established himself as a first-team regular in the 1921–22 season, making 40 appearances in all competitions. However, he lost his place to Jimmy Stephenson four games into the following season, and never played a first-team match for the club again. He was released on a free transfer in June 1923, and joined First Division side Arsenal three months later. After making one first team appearance in 1923–24, Wallington left the club, and later returned to amateur football.
